thread.title: AIDS vaccine 'cures' 5 patients and are 'virus free'

title: AIDS vaccine 'cures' 5 patients and are 'virus free'
text: show ad AIDS vaccine 'cures' 5 patients - who have now been 'virus-free' 7 months WITHOUT the help of daily drugs A vaccine has helped five patients control their HIV levels for seven months after just one shot, a new study stays It comes after years of massive efforts and investments to find a shot Those who currently have HIV or AIDS take antiretroviral drugs The scientists' goal is to keep the virus at bay for years without the use of drugs Published: 23:21 GMT, 23 February 2017 | Updated: 01:34 GMT, 24 February 2017 288 shares
